overview:
Current President at Spectorsoft

Past VP of Marketing at Concurrent Controls VP of Marketing at Ocean Isle Software Director of Software Development at ConnectWorks Director of Software Development at Mathtec Software Developer at Alloy Computer Products Software Engineer at Logicraft

Education University of New Hampshire

Top-notch software developer from 1983 to 1993, during which time I co-developed Carbon Copy and ReachOut. the Top Two software products for controlling a remote PC via modem or company network.

Since 1993, I have been the VP of Marketing for several successful startups, including Ocean Isle Software, Concurrent Controls, and SpectorSoft, and since 1999, have served as the VP Marketing and President for SpectorSoft, makers of Spector, Spector Pro, eBlaster, Spector CNE and Spector 360.

SpectorSoft is the worldwide recognized leader in monitoring and surveillance software for home computers and company PCs.

Experience President Flag this position Spectorsoft VP of Marketing Concurrent Controls VP of Marketing Ocean Isle Software Director of Software Development ConnectWorks Director of Software Development Mathtec Software Developer Alloy Computer Products Software Engineer Logicraft

Education University of New Hampshire BS, Mathematics and Computer Science
